isis.stitle: DT-466E and 530E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1995) - ENGINE CONTROL SYSTEM OVERVIEW - ELECTRONIC CONTROL MODULE - RAM

svcproc.title: RAM
svcproc.para: Random Access Memory is a temporary storage memory for current events such as current engine temperature or current speed, pedal position etc. It is the memory to which information is temporarily stored so that it can be compared to the information in the ROM. Unlike the Rom memory, the RAM is lost every time the key is turned off or when power is interrupted to the ECM.
